title: Chicken masala soup
ingredients: ['2 tbsp vegetable oil', '2 onions, finely chopped', '2 large garlic cloves, crushed', '1 tsp ground coriander', '1 tsp ground cumin', '¼ tsp ground cayenne pepper, or to taste', '¼ tsp ground cloves', '¼ tsp ground ginger', '¼ tsp ground turmeric', '1 litre chicken or vegetable stock', '400g can chopped tomatoes', '450g skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into 5mm strips', '225g runner beans, trimmed and chopped', '400g can chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', 'TO GARNISH', '4 tbsp low-fat natural yoghurt', 'sprigs of fresh coriander']
